extendedInfo.description: PRESS RELEASE â 28th June, 2013 â Wallasey, Merseyside and Lichfield, Staffs. EnglandRe.: Previously Unseen 'Miner Willy' Game Emerges After 28 YearsâWillyâs Great Adventureâ for the ZX Spectrum is authorised by Matthew Smith, author of âManic Minerâ and Jet Set Willyâ.âWillyâs Great Adventure: ZX Spectrumâ will be available from the iTunes App Store, from the Google Play Store and for Amazon Kindle Fire / HD on Friday 28th June, 2013 and after for Windows Phone 8 & Windows 8.âWillyâs Great Adventureâ was developed by Terry Lloyd in 1985, as a homage to Matthew Smithâs âMiner Willyâ games. âWillyâs Great Adventureâ has not previously been released and is believed to be otherwise unknown, until offered to Elite (in an email at 9:50am on 12th July 2012) for publication.âI can confirm it has never seen the light of day. Unless someone stole it off my computer and put it out there without me knowing {:~). I've been playing it through again myself to test it, and I have to say I think it's one of the most complete and totally customized mods out there (in terms of all new rooms, tiles and sprites). Although there are some other good ones I've played, a lot of them keep the original graphics and just have new rooms, while some change the graphics but the rooms and map are very similar to the original. Whereas, WGA changed about 98% of the original stuff (Willy even has a new hat, an Indy-style adventurer's Fedora).â - Terry.IMPORTANT NOTE: Matthew Smith and Elite have previously announced that they are to co-operate in the development and publication of a new game. âWillyâs Great Adventureâ is NOT that game. A further announcement about that game will be made at a later date.This Press Release is published by:Elite Systems Ltd. Celebrating 25 Years ! 1984-2009http://www.elite-systems.co.ukTwitter: @elite_systemsLegal Notice: Willyâs Great Adventure TM & Â© 1985-2013, Matthew Smith. Developed by Terry Lloyd. reviews.title: Reigniting my love for Jet Set Willy!
reviews.comment: I am finding it rock hard though. I\'d better practice some more...
reviews.author: Pete Collins

reviews.title: Nostalgic
reviews.comment: I forgot quite how frustratingly difficult these games were. Nice emulation of a speccy. Was this originally made with one of the Jet Set Willy editors you could buy out of the back of magazines? It would good to see some creative features in the emulation, like automatic progressive map making. My days of graph paper mapping are way behind me.
reviews.author: Daniel Gibson

reviews.title: Bit pricey IMO.
reviews.comment: But lovin it all the same even if its for no other reason than nostalgia. Now give us some more, why should iOS owners get all the fun.
reviews.author: Chris Bannister

reviews.title: Speccy Heaven
reviews.comment: One word...  Awesome. Thank you Elite for making this possible.
reviews.author: Jamie O\'Neill

reviews.title: Common
reviews.comment: Ok ok nexus 7 compatibility whooo but Skool Daze still ain\'t around and it was released first plzzz fix that now . And as for the rest of the collection get on android asap , your losing out and robbing android users of Elite bliss , hell I\'ve still got my 128k specy .......
reviews.author: Colin Ferguson
